meta_description: Experience interactive exhibitions and hands-on events at the MAH. Become part of the Santa Cruz County creative community.
hours_text:
### The MAH

[ 705 Front St.  
Downtown  
Santa Cruz, CA 95060  ](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Santa+Cruz+Museum+of+Art+%26+History/@36.9746167,-122.0276802,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x808e402672dbb76b:0x88dee35639218ba8!8m2!3d36.9746167!4d-122.0254915)

### Open

Mon | 9AM-1PM  
---|---  
Thu-Fri | 12-8pm  
Sat–Sun | 12–6PM  
Tax ID | 94-2718861  
  
### Suggested Admission Prices

  * $10 General Admission
  * $8 Seniors / Students / Teachers / Veterans
  * FREE for members and children under 5.

_*The[suggested admission price](https://www.santacruzmah.org/accessibility) applies to daily admission and is not applicable to special ticketed exhibitions or events._

[ Become a Member Today ](https://www.santacruzmah.org/membership)

[ Getting Here ](https://www.santacruzmah.org/getting-here)

collections_text:
##  On View

[ ](https://www.santacruzmah.org/exhibitions/ed-penniman-landscapes-of-home)

#### Ed Penniman: Landscapes of Home

Santa Cruz artist Ed Penniman’s paintings convey his deep appreciation for life and the natural beauty of the region, shaped by his experiences of overcoming adversity.

[ View ](https://www.santacruzmah.org/exhibitions/ed-penniman-landscapes-of-home)

[ ](https://www.santacruzmah.org/exhibitions/live-oak-surfing-history-2025)

#### Surf Live Oak

[ View ](https://www.santacruzmah.org/exhibitions/live-oak-surfing-history-2025)

[ View All ](https://www.santacruzmah.org/exhibitions)

##  Upcoming Events

[ ](https://www.santacruzmah.org/events/closed-for-mlk-day/2026/01/19)

Monday, January 19, 2026 (all day) 

### [Closed for MLK Day ](https://www.santacruzmah.org/events/closed-for-mlk-day/2026/01/19)

The MAH will be closed for MLK Day, January 19th. 

[ View the event ](https://www.santacruzmah.org/events/closed-for-mlk-day/2026/01/19)

[ ](https://www.santacruzmah.org/events/open-archives/2026/01/22)

Thursday, January 22, 2026,   
1pm - 3pm 

### [Open Archives ](https://www.santacruzmah.org/events/open-archives/2026/01/22)

Step into the MAH’s Archives Reading Room during our weekly Open Archives hours. Meet the archivist, see a unique item from the collection on display, and discover where Santa Cruz history is preserved. 

[ View the event ](https://www.santacruzmah.org/events/open-archives/2026/01/22)
